Researcher.Name: Philip Johnson
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Philip Johnson is a Professor of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii.

Researcher.Name: Victor Basili
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Victor Basili is a Professor of Computer Science at the University of Maryland.

Researcher.Name: Marvin Zelkowitz
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Mark Zelkowitz is a Professor of Computer Science at the University of Maryland

Researcher.Name: Bernard Wong
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Bernard Wong is a Senior Lecturer at the University of Technology

Researcher.Name: David Zubrow
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Dr. David Zubrow is the Team Lead for the Software Engineering Measurement and Analysis at CMU.

Researcher.Name: Marcela Genero Bocco
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Dra. Marcela Genero Bocco is an Assistant Professor at the University of Castilla in La Mancha, Spain.

Researcher.Name: Oscar Pastor
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Dr. Oscar Pastor is the Full Professor and the leader of the OO-Method Research Group in Polytechnic University of Valencia.

Researcher.Name: Kenichi Matsumoto
Researcher.Organization: Nara Institute of Science and Technology
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Professor Kenichi Matsumoto teaches at the Nara Institute of Science and Technology

Researcher.Name: David Klappholz
Researcher.Bio-Statement: Dr. David Klappholz is an Assoc. Professor of the Stevens Institute of Technology and is the Assoc. Director of the NJ Center for Software Engineering
